Headline: No trains between Howard and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Fullerton due to an injured employee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Fullerton due to an injured employee.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Fullerton at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Fullerton to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
